edu.uka.aifb.api.concept.search
Interface IConceptMatcher

public interface IConceptMatcher

This specifies a class for concept based search. Based on a ceratin scoring model all matches for a specified query are returned.

Author:
pso

Method Summary
 java.util.List<IMatch> getMatches(IConceptVector queryCV)
          This function performs a complete retrieval step for a specified query which is represented by a concept vector.
 void setScorerClass(java.lang.String className)
          This sets the scoring model for the concept based retrieval.
 

Method Detail

setScorerClass

void setScorerClass(java.lang.String className)
This sets the scoring model for the concept based retrieval.

Parameters:
className - The name of the IScorer class that implements the concept based retrieval model.

getMatches

java.util.List<IMatch> getMatches(IConceptVector queryCV)
This function performs a complete retrieval step for a specified query which is represented by a concept vector. A sorted list of matches is returned that contain a ranking of documents relevant to the query based on the retrieval model.

Parameters:
queryCV - The concept vector of the query that should be searched for.
Returns:
A sorted list of matches containing relevant documents and their scores.
